Docs.summary: Calls a public method of a specified object or type.

remarks.format:

Public ReadOnly Property GenericTypeArguments As Collection(Of Type)

Docs.summary: The generic type arguments of the contained method.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The generic type arguments must only be set if the called method is generic.
## Examples The following code sample demonstrates setting the GenericTypeArguments of an <xref:System.Activities.Statements.InvokeMethod> activity. Docs.summary: The name of the method to be invoked when the activity executes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The invoked method must be declared as public.
## Examples The following code sample demonstrates setting the MethodName property of an <xref:System.Activities.Statements.InvokeMethod> activity. This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity) sample.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As Collection(Of Argument)

Docs.summary: The parameter collection of the method to be invoked.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The parameters must be added to the collection in the same order that they appear in the method signature. Parameters cannot be named `TargetObject` or `Result`.
## Examples The following code sample demonstrates setting the Parameters of an <xref:System.Activities.Statements.InvokeMethod> activity. This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity) sample.
